name: @fav/math.log10
description: Calculates the base 10 logarithm of a number.

scripts.web:build: npm run web:build-src && npm run web:build-test
scripts.web:build-src: browserify index.js --standalone fav.math.log10 -o web/fav.math.log10.js && cd web && uglifyjs fav.math.log10.js --compress --mangle -o fav.math.log10.min.js --source-map url="'fav.math.gcd.min.js.map'"
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build

author: Takayuki Sato
